original: 桃園結義後，按長幼，<color=#b6f8f4>劉備</color>成了大哥，<color=#b6f8f4>關羽</color>做了老二，<color=#b6f8f4>張飛</color>為老三。
text: After Taoyuan ends the justice, press the elder brother, <color=#b6f8f4>Liu Bei</color> becomes the eldest brother, <color=#b6f8f4>Guan Yu</color> becomes the second child, <color=#b6f8f4>Zhang Fei</color>As the youngest.
